description:
Mild vanilla honey, sandwiched between two rich dark chocolate waffles, make Honey Stinger’s new waffle a seriously delicious way to refuel. Easy to eat and easy to digest, these waffles provide a quick hit of carbs to keep you going. Also excellent with coffee or tea as a mid-morning snack.

  • 100% organic ingredients
  • 140 calories per waffle
  • Ingredients: gluten free flour blend (organic rice flour, organic tapioca starch, organic potato starch), organic brown rice syrup, organic palm fruit oil, organic cane sugar, organic eggs, organic cocoa, organic soy flour, organic honey, sea salt, natural flavors, baking soda, soy lecithin, xanthan gum, organic rice extract
  • Contains: Soy and eggs
  • May contain milk
name: Honey Stinger GF Cookies and Cream Waffle
